html:
11.3.22  10:10 am   thoughts on the moon?

      'wow what an empty place' .... 'the days feel like months'

11.3.22  8:57 am   i am currently too focused on the shape "circle" and the fact that circles are "round". how can i convert this into something useful? or should i distract myself and become focused on something more productive?

      you could start thinking about the relationships between the sides and angles of various triangles you can inscribe into the circle

11.3.22  7:13 am   how do you understand things that don't make sense

      see if you can get an artistic license

11.3.22  5:21 am   will you represent a crab wearing a cool hat in your next video?

      no

11.3.22  12:13 am   thoughts on the epic face?

      looks like more of a birthday face to me

11.2.22  8:22 pm   Is there any reason why the line "maybe I could eat blades of grass" has little to do with the rest of the video?

     it's the other way around. the rest of the video has little to do with the starting line

     Is it more thematically relevant than I realize?

     it's a starting device. it's like starting a car. the sound of a car starting probably sounds totally different from the way the rest of the journey sounds. but without that, you might never get started

11.2.22  8:05 pm   are you happy?

      sometimes

11.2.22  7:53 pm   https://youtu.be/yaz2qQ2pWHg

What's this chord exactly at 0:05 seconds? I'll just simplify the chords but for now it basically goes like C#, F#, then __, I don't know which chord is that.

It's mostly the same chord progression throughout the whole song but what's the third chord in that progression? Thanks.

      the first 4 chords, the way i would chart it, is Dbmaj7, Gbmaj7, Cmin7(no5), F7

11.2.22  7:00 pm   do you have your getting-of-ducks-in-rows in a row?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.2.22  6:53 pm   is the switch to non-song videos to make up for the severe lack of any since 2019,

     just about

     or is there some other reason?

     it's my desire to do them. which i've always had, it's just that i've always felt like songs were more important. songs are very important to me, but now i've done a lot of them recently, and the desire to do scenes, scenery, and siutuational dialogue, has grown out of control

11.2.22  6:12 pm   do you have any tips for making the jump to longer-form content

      just continue doing short things until you absolutely can't stand it anymore

11.2.22  5:24 pm   how to stop procrastinating

      first, try to avoid saying the word "procrastinating". it's a very long word and takes up a lot of time

11.2.22  4:59 pm   why do they call it oven when you of in the cold food of hot out eat the food?

      that's a fair point

11.2.22  3:59 pm   what was your proudest moment

      i don't know yet

11.2.22  2:45 pm   do you listen to your own music?

      sometimes, but it's usually either too good or too bad, which overwhelms me

11.2.22  2:28 pm   can you get to india through north america?

      not very easily

11.2.22  2:16 pm   how do you tell the difference between when something you made is bad and when you've just been working on it for too long and can no longer see the good parts

      can't tell

11.2.22  2:13 pm   How bill make video?

      we'll see

11.2.22  2:07 pm   Why do we have 10 fingers and not 12?

      why would we have 12 and not 10

11.2.22  1:48 pm   thoughts on cats?

      improbable, but not impossible

11.2.22  1:26 pm   Why are there Halloween songs and Christmas songs, but no Thanksgiving songs?

      thanksgiving is possibly more local than you realize

11.2.22  1:16 pm   is your streak of non music videos going to continue?

      non "music videos" yes, meaning non-song videos. although it should be quite common for them to include music, particularly in the underscore, and also some singing, as needed

11.2.22  1:14 pm   tips for surviving November 2nd?

      don't look at the calendar

11.2.22  12:19 pm   Why did you say you "just did a bad thing"

     i didn't say it. i wrote and sang it in a song

     when you said you didn't?

     i have different ways to answer the questions about the "bad thing". that's just an attempt to provide a splash of variety here in the questions section

      Is it not classified as a bad thing anymore?

     there are 2 actual elements of the "bad thing" song which i consider actual bad things. 1: when selecting which song idea to start with for the writing of the song, i made the mistake of spending too much time eliminating things from the list, and accidentally eliminated all of them. So un-eliminated all of them and then deliberately chose what seemed like the worst one, which was only "just did a bad thing" and not much else. 2: i was aggressively failing to meet my deadlines for the release of the song and video, and they ended up being released separately and both later than i wanted

11.2.22  12:10 pm   just did a bad thing

      i understand

11.2.22  11:03 am   how much money should i spend on an intermediate level midi keyboard 

      never heard of it

11.2.22  10:23 am   why does the guy in "out to lunch" have actual hair instead of floating scribbles over his head like most of your characters?

      to give it a vivid sense of lifelike realism

11.2.22  9:43 am   what is "VACATIONING IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUN"?

     certainly a reprise of "vacationing in the center of the earth", which was a vent of frustration about being caught up in unweildy and large projects or endeavors

     it's listed in expert mode but doesn't seem to have a link?

     that's right. expert mode is more than just linked items. i'm beginning to think expert mode might be too advanced for you at the moment

11.2.22  9:16 am   is the world simulated

      indeed, the world is probably the most popular thing to simulate

11.2.22  7:48 am   Will we ever see the return of the two friends?

      you'll probably think you do, even if you don't

11.2.22  7:25 am   why is a lemon called a lemon?

     it's similar to what citrus fruits were called in arabia

      is it lemon colored?

     it better be

11.2.22  2:48 am   Hi Bill, any gud techniques to penalize self when i dont stick to a schedule?

      spend years without a schedule

11.2.22  2:22 am   I want to stay home tomorrow 

      i understand

11.2.22  1:10 am   i climbed back down, but how to climb back out?

      this may seem counter-intuitive, but you'll have to go forward

      no

      believable

      yes i do

      no

      join in the fun

      too big

     not really, but there will be

     it be really cool to see the creative process

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.1.22  8:46 pm   Why are there so many camera angle changes in the closing door scene of "Out to Lunch"

      because i can

      the calendar plays exactly like 2017, and 2006

11.1.22  7:54 pm   how did your music change from your earlier music like "i can play" to now, it seems different

      it got later, in time

11.1.22  6:37 pm   What is the avarage amount of birds killed by one stone?

      0.00000000000001

11.1.22  6:35 pm   Was it lunch time in "out to lunch" or did the character just randomly go?

      the character went to lunch due to some frustration

whats abusing you?

      nothing. that's one of my many "unabused" tunes

11.1.22  6:16 pm   WHo is more attractive, Waluigi, or The Rock?

      the only thing that matters is whether or not they are attracted to each other

      i couldn't even begin to imagine
